title: BARD - Mark's Prediction Vindication
itunes:title: BARD - Mark's Prediction Vindication
description:
Gary and Mark link up to discuss the recent prediction that Mark made coming true as well as the possibilities of war crimes charges on the heels of President Biden's comments on the matter

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
